name: Twin Gun Turbo Square
description:
I started learning game making about a month ago and this is my first ever jam and finished game so please enjoy my bad game :)

The story so far:

You're a killer square trapped in a world filled with... other killer squares. Only they're red and don't have cool guns like you do. This is an all out war. It's literally one versus a million.

Gameplay:

Arcade style game that is score based. Try to achieve the highest score possible! Destroy other squares to earn points. The game progressively gets harder.

The Theme:TWO

How does it fit? Well you play as a square with TWO different types of guns to switch between. Each of your guns has an alternate fire mode to use with different effects.

Tools used:

Engine: Godot 3.2

Art: Aesprite

Sound FX: BFXR

Assets that I didn't make:

For the shotgun sprite I used this sheet as reference:

by congusbongus

https://opengameart.org/content/tiny-gun-icons-16x16

The music was done by centurian_of_war:

https://opengameart.org/content/i-am-not-trash-or-am-i

Controls:

A + W - move left/right

Space - jump/double jump

Q - switch gun type

Left mouse button - Gun fire type 1

Right mouse button - Gun fire type 2

Shift - Dash ( Has a short cooldown of half a second but gives i-frames)
